uiDefinition.description: The API Key for this api
uiDefinition.tooltip: The API key is a bearer token. Place it in the Authorization header (Bearer act_xxxx)

properties.description: Lex Persona is a European qualified trust services provider offering a range of electronic signature solutions. With Lex Enterprise, you have access to all the eIDAS signature levels, along with a large number of signer authentication methods. Your signature books are embedded in digital workflows. Automate connections between Lex Enterprise and all your tools to eliminate repetitive tasks, gain efficiency, and accelerate your business.
